title: TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree for Indoor Kitten Small Cats with Green Leaves, Cozy Plush Indoor Plant Design Cat House Cute Cat Condo Cat Scratching Posts with Hang Ball, Green Pet Home Cat Furniture
descriptions:
Introducing the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree, a versatile and functional cat furniture that your feline friend will love!

- Design: This cat tree features a 2-in-1 design, serving as both a cat condo and a cat sisal scratching post.
- Material: Made with high-quality 600g skin-friendly plush and soft carpet, providing a cozy and comfortable space for your cat.
- Stability: The cat tree is designed with a safe and stable base to avoid tipping and wobbling, ensuring the safety of your cat.
- Home Integration: The leaves design adds a touch of greenery to your home, seamlessly integrating with your interior decor.
- Functionality: This cat tree provides a rest and play space for your cat, with a large enough condo for kittens or one medium-sized cat.
- Assembly: Easy to assemble in three simple steps within 1 to 8 minutes, with tools included in the package.
- Customer Service: We are committed to providing quality products and attentive service, ensuring customer satisfaction. Contact information is available for any inquiries.
- Dimensions: The overall dimensions of this cat tree are 11" x 15" x 41".
- Color Options: Choose from Grey, Beige, or Green to match your home decor.
- Weight: This cat tree weighs 6 pounds, making it easy to move around your home.
- Package Contents: The package includes 1× Cat Tree, 1× Assembly Instruction, and 1× Set of Tools.
- Warnings: Please check the size before buying, place the cat tree on a flat floor against the wall for more stability, and do not allow children to play with the cat tree.

Upgrade your cat's playtime with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree. Order now and provide your furry friend with a cozy and entertaining space of their own!

Safety and stability are paramount, and the TSCOMON Cat Tree is designed with a safe and stable base to avoid tipping and wobbling. For added stability, we recommend placing it on a flat floor against the wall.

The TSCOMON Cat House Cat Tree weighs only 6 pounds, making it easy to move around your home as needed.

In the package, you will receive 1× Cat Tree, 1× Assembly Instruction, and 1× Set of Tools, ensuring a complete and hassle-free setup.

- Please check the size before buying to ensure it fits your space.
- For optimal stability, place the cat tree on a flat floor against the wall.
- Ensure child safety by not allowing children to play with the cat tree.
